snippet: The state will stop administering the lethal drugs used in a botched execution last year, but the effort to find alternatives could delay future executions.
abstract: Ohio may delay several executions as it switches lethal drugs used for procedure, in wake of botched execution of Dennis McGuire in 2014.
lead_paragraph: The state will stop administering the lethal drugs used in a botched execution last year, but the effort to find alternatives could delay future executions.

headline.main: Drug Switch May Delay Executions in Ohio
headline.print_headline: Drug Switch May Delay Executions in Ohio
